H0.text: Who became President of the USA following the assassination of William McKinley in 1901. Grover Cleveland

H1.text: Who became President of the USA following the assassination of William McKinley in 1901. William Howard Taft

H2.text: Who became President of the USA following the assassination of William McKinley in 1901. Theodore Roosevelt's Vice President

H3.text: Who became President of the USA following the assassination of William McKinley in 1901. T Ros

A6.text: Roosevelt became president following the assassination of President William McKinley, under whom he had served as vice president.

A7.text: McKinley died at 2:15 am on September 14 and was succeeded by his vice president, Theodore Roosevelt.
